name: Airbus A330 - 300
description: The Airbus A330 is a wide-body aircraft developed and produced by Airbus. Airbus conceived several derivatives of the A300, its first airliner from the mid-1970s. Then the company began development on the A330 twinjet in parallel with the A340 quadjet and launched both designs with their first orders in June 1987. The A330-300, the first variant, took its maiden flight in November 1992 and entered service with Air Inter in January 1994. The slightly shorter A330-200 variant followed in 1998. The A330-300 has a range of 11,750 km (6,350 nmi; 7,300 mi) with 277 passengers, while the shorter A330-200 can cover 13,450 km (7,250 nmi; 8,360 mi) with 247 passengers.

items.title: Check voltages BAT1, BAT2 and APU
External power (if AVAIL)
items.description: Conecta la alimentación al suministro externo para no consumir las baterías. Si no hay suministro externo, se reclama a los servicios de tierra

items.title: APU fire test
items.zone: Over head panel, APU fire alarm panel
items.status: Press test and check APU fire alarm
items.description: Se enciende la alarma general del avión.

items.title: APU START
items.description: Comienza el arranque del APU. Se espera a que el APU esté listo para ser utilizado. Se puede comprobar el estado de arranque en el ECAM
